scenario_text.value:
Look, Takuma. Not a single computer on any of
the desks.

Huh, you’re right. You think someone tidied
up the place or something?

If that were true, they wouldn’t have left so
many other things behind, don’t you think?

And look at those teaching materials. They’re
clearly from the past.

At first I just thought this was an old
facility put into use...

But could this actually be a school from the
past?
A school from the past? What do you mean?

This is fascinating, but we have to make
Labramon our number one priority now.
